action: I want to safely upload contracts and reference files
reason: To centrally manage business-related files and share information
acceptance_criteria: Only authenticated users can upload files.
Users without permissions cannot upload files.
A maximum file size limit is strictly enforced.
Only allowed file extensions can be uploaded.
Virus scanning must be executed upon every upload.
File names must be sanitized to prevent malicious injections.
Files must be converted to unique file names (e.g., UUID) upon storage.
The storage system must be encrypted (Encryption at Rest).
HTTPS communication is mandatory for all file transfers.
Logs must be stored upon successful file upload.
Upload logs must include user_id, file name, and timestamp.
Permission checks must be performed during every download attempt.
Direct link access to stored files is strictly prohibited.
File deletion must be performed as a logical delete.
Audit logs must be stored upon every deletion event.
SQL injection countermeasures must be implemented for metadata handling.
XSS countermeasures must be applied to file metadata and displays.
Rate limiting is applied to the upload and download endpoints.
The file management API must be REST-compliant.
File metadata (size, type, owner, etc.) must be managed in the database.
